entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Coola
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Coola Airport 08:46 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
